law.catch_line: Civil action for injunctive or other equitable relief.

text.section: KRS 224.80-100 to 224.80-210 shall not limit the cabinet's exercise of regulatory authority under law with respect to an environmental response project unless the environmental covenant expressly prohibits the cabinet from undertaking specified actions.
A person shall not be responsible for or subject to liability for environmental remediation solely because the person has the right to enforce an environmental covenant.

law.history: Created 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 11, effective June 20, 2005.
